H0.text: who is the president of costa rica in 2012. Óscar Arias

H1.text: who is the president of costa rica in 2012. Jose Maria Figueres

H2.text: who is the president of costa rica in 2012. Rafael Angel Calderon

H3.text: who is the president of costa rica in 2012. Laura Chinchilla

A4.text: Laura Chinchilla served as President of Costa Rica from 2010 to 2014.

A5.text: Óscar Arias Sánchez was the predecessor of Laura Chinchilla and served as President before her term.
